e
> precariousness of her position.

DINOBOT smiled, "Why yes.  But we still have no remote confir=
mation that you are telling the truth beyond serving your own ends.  And if=
, you are as you claim, a Predacon..  Were circumstances reversed you would=
 do the same thing."

His tail cannon charged, "Now, stand down and submit =
or we can take you apart piece by piece."
